content.rendered:
Install Bibledit on Android

  1. Install Bibledit from Google Play.
  2. Start the Bibledit app.
  3. Give it a while to initialize.
  4. Connect to Bibledit Cloud via menu Settings / Cloud.

Alternative installation options:

  1. HUAWEI AppGallery
  2. Sideloading via GitHub
  3. F-Droid catalog and sharing mechanism

Home
Review
